Hi! I'm Jayanth Prathipati

I am

Student, Mobile Developer, UX Researcher

I am a Computer Science senior at Virginia Tech with a heavy focus on HCI.
I work at the Usability Lab at Virginia Tech doing research on personal and health informatics. I'm also a software engineer at Element 84.
Finally, I'm the creator of Jhana and Compost for Instapaper. When I'm not working, I like to take photographs on instagram and write about UX on my blog.

Check out my projects!
